title: game not launching after update
body: After the update was released i launched lol like every day and the Client sayed it had to close and the update window pup up and when the update finished nothing happend i did the task manager and found nothing about lol any ideas how to fix this .....  Oh note i tried the admin launcher and same outcome nothing happens

replies.body: Now it dont even want to launch the client xD

This is so dumb every update i have to go to my neighbor to get lol guys fix this client and thx for your replying bro but it didnt fix anything every thing my pc is working fine and this is the same as when i tried to download it it sayed i had to download 14 gb (its insane) well i have to go get lol in my usb or i should just stop playing this game and get a life and a gf cya boi

It's important to save your game to your primary internal drive.  Saving to a USB or external drive will constantly force the patcher to download new game files every time you launch it, and only keep them temporarily.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Its in my primary  internal drive mate

Is League installed on your primary internal drive?  It sounds like your patcher is trying to update, but something is blocking it from applying so it's retrying every time.  Run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide just to double check your security settings and make sure League is added as an exception.  Then test it in a custom to make sure everything is okay!
I did launch lol as administrator and same but some how it did launch the client after lots of tries and there was a update of 3 gb is that fine ?

Launching the client as administrator doesn't necessarily give access to everything else, like game assets.  The large update is likely the result of corrupt game files or the patcher failing to find your game files (due to permissions), and attempting to create new ones.  Without proper permissions, it will likely try and update again until resolved.
The prkblem dont have to be from my pc dude idc any more am quitting
So what am supposed to do bro i ve never encountered tgis kinda stuff in the old client and problem seems to be in both my pc's .... I will try to do the things in support stuff and reply to you
